entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
